team_info.description: A collaborative research project investigating corpus-informed and document-level machine translation improvements.

member_001.name: Alaina Brandt
member_001.description: I’m currently researching how machine learning can be aplied to my areas of specialization: translation and localization. I have professional development certificates in GAI and ML and data science from MIT, with a web programming certificate on the way.
